C21.text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

C21.text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

C21.name: Breena, the Demagogue
C21.text:
Flying
Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, if that opponent has more life than another of your opponents, that attacking player draws a card and you put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control.

C21.name: Osgir, the Reconstructor
C21.text:
Vigilance
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{X}, {T}, Exile an artifact with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

C21.name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
C21.text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you list this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

C21.name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
C21.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 ore greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.

STA.name: Abundant Harvest
STA.text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

STA.flavor:
"Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!"
—Zimone, Quandrix mage-student
STA.name: Blue Sun's Zenith
STA.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

STA.name: Brainstorm
STA.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

STA.flavor:
"As long as you are breathing, you always have something more to give."
—Valentin, Witherbloom dean
STA.name: Channel
STA.text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

STA.flavor:
"One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply arrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates."
—Imbraham, Quandrix dean
STA.name: Counterspell
STA.text: Counter target spell.

STA.name: Crux of Fate
STA.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

STA.flavor:
"You'd be amazed how much a single plant has to teach oyu."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean
STA.name: Cultivate
STA.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

STA.flavor:
"They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?"
—Incantations of Lim-Dûl
STA.name: Dark Ritual
STA.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.

STA.flavor:
"This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."
—Director Taiva, to Isabough
STA.name: Day of Judgment
STA.text: Destroy all creatures.

STA.flavor:
"For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."
—_Heroics: A Book of Fables_
STA.name: Defiant Strike
STA.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

STA.flavor:
"Demons prefer to deal with those who believe themselves too wise to be fooled."
—Scroll case inscription
STA.name: Demonic Tutor
STA.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

STA.flavor: 「悪魔は、自分が賢く、騙されることなどないと信じている者を好む。」 ー巻物入れに刻まれた言葉
STA.name: Demonic Tutor
STA.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

STA.flavor:
"The hydraulic power grip was a failure, but the gauntlets were a shocking success."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus
STA.name: Electrolyze
STA.text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Draw a card.

STA.name: Ephemerate
STA.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

STA.flavor:
"I've gleaned greater insight from the spiraling of a single fern than I have from all the books I've ever read."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

STA.text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

STA.flavor:
"The bloody din of invasion faded
And silent song rang through the woods again."
—"Song of Freyalise"

STA.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

STA.flavor:
"On a world where time was torn asunder, destruction ruled the minds of all."
—Multiversal Metahistories

Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)

STA.flavor:
"Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember."
—Director Taiva, journal entry
STA.name: Memory Lapse
STA.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

STA.name: Mind's Desire
STA.text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

STA.flavor:
"The wish most often granted is the wish to choose one's own destiny."
—*Aethershrine*, inscription

Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

"From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."

"Never reject the kindness of a serpent. It will not be offered twice."

STA.name: Teferi's Protection

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
